casebody.data:
Hanesbrands Inc.
v.
Kathleen Fowler 438A15-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 28, 2016 David C. Pishko, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Fowler, Kathleen. Robin E. Shea, Attorney at Law, Jill S. Stricklin, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Hanesbrand Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of June 2016 by Defendant for Continuance of Oral Argument:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of June 2016."
